name: Neritic
slogan: A scientific approach to your technology
description: We are building a platform for companies to sell their financial research as well as their market data to the wider public

jobs.title: Remote Full stack developer
jobs.description:
A Young and inspiring startup is looking for a  remote Python Full stack developer.

Our exciting company is dealing in the procurement and social enterprise space and is looking forward to develop its core technology.
As we're still in our early stages joining us will give you the opportunity to truly have an immense influence and impact on the company.
In terms of values we deeply appreciate creativity, technical abilities but also great communication skills

The project is completely greenfield as will be based around the below technologies and will therefore be a hard requirement for the role:

Github
Postgres SQL
Django (2.0+)
React
Typescript
AWS
In terms of programming languages:

Python
Javascript
SQL
